Articles.Content: Banned because Wielders always arrive exactly when they mean to.
Banned for painting an iron crown red (unless it's red hot) and for making a crown out of iron instead of gold or something.
Banned for not probing stalkers.
Banned for the 10,000th post in the Awesome Pictures thread (beautiful pic BTW).
Banned for changing your avatar to a Santa crown.
Banned for being a Grinch.
Banned for making that amazing visual pack.
Banned for banter's sake!
Banned for having a spitfire in your sig.
Banned for your post being having a post number in this thread that is prime.
banned for being confusing
Banned for being an easily confused spaceplane engineer.
Banned for rude behavior on munar colonies
banned for bad piloting.
Banned for driving aircraft. Blade Runner 2?
Banned for being five minutes ahead of me.
Banned for having different names for everything
Banned because 844 looks better in the grey/yellow paint scheme...

Banned for not being presidential enough.

Unbanned for having Poland into space.

Banned for painting celestial objects to mark them as your own.
Banned for being the head of the Illuminati
Banned for not bring Snacks or Fyre Flair on board.

Banned for claiming to be a pan wielder but not containing a pan in your profile pic or signature! It is preposterous!

(BTW side note, does necro post count on forum games or should i create a new thread for it?)
Banned for your hat looking too cartoony (at least add some noise to the hat, then smudge, then strokes).
All caps username? BANNED!
Being just half of a fraction banned! (I know it's a little bit less than half).
